title: Best of The Herd for Sep 29, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Sep 29, 2020
description:
-We can't unsee what happened to the Ravens last night

-It's not Doc Rivers' fault that Paul George isn't clutch

-The Chiefs are still vulnerable to two teams in the NFL

-Jerry Jones makes a strange comment regarding Dak and Tony Romo

-Benching Carson Wentz is a really bad idea

-The Herd Hierarchy, Colin's top ten teams in the NFL


Guest: Peter King, NBC Sports

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
